s0009: The King of Wei put down his game and wished to summon ministers.
s0113: Wei restored Xinling to the prince.
s0117: Lord Pingyuan called the prince frivolous.
s0119: The prince departed, saying Lord Pingyuan was unworthy.
s0126: Half his retainers left for the prince.
s0155: His name crowns the feudal lords.
